author: Sina stratemann
text: I used this luggage locker service during my visit and everything went super smoothly. The process was easy and secure. The lockers were clean and spacious and I really appreciated being able to access my bags whenever I needed!! Overall, great service! I‚Äôd definitely use it again ‚ò∫Ô∏è

author: Janine Stratemann
text: The lockers were extremely clean, safe and well-maintained. The whole process was very easy, the price was fair, and I felt completely comfortable and safe leaving my luggage here. Highly recommended!!

author: Tamara Stjepanovic
text:
Great lockers ! Super easy to use and very clean. The best part is that I can access my bags whenever I need to.
I would definitely recommend if you're visiting Cordoba üòÑ

author: Lourdes Lopez
text: Amazing service, didn't have where to leave the luggage and the station was packed. 100% recommended if you're stopping by Cordoba
